unnormalised: Exam Prep Apps: Your Ticket to Acing Those Exams!
normalised: Exam Prep Apps: Your Ticket to Acing Those Exams!

unnormalised: Hey everyone, ditch the bulky textbooks! Exam prep apps are totally trending in the Indian ed-tech scene right now. From cracking IIT-JEE to acing your CBSE boards, there’s an app for everything.
normalised: Hey everyone, ditch the bulky textbooks! Exam prep apps are totally trending in the Indian ed-tech scene right now. From cracking I I T-J E E to acing your C B S E boards, there's an app for everything.

unnormalised: Forget burning the midnight oil studying only from your NCERT books; these apps offer interactive quizzes, mock tests, and even personalized learning paths! Think of it like having your own private tutor in your pocket, ready to help you conquer those tough topics.
normalised: Forget burning the midnight oil studying only from your N C E R T books; these apps offer interactive quizzes, mock tests, and even personalized learning paths! Think of it like having your own private tutor in your pocket, ready to help you conquer those tough topics.

unnormalised: Many apps even incorporate gamified learning, making studying less of a chore and more of a game – perfect for those long hours leading up to exam season.
normalised: Many apps even incorporate gamified learning, making studying less of a chore and more of a game – perfect for those long hours leading up to exam season.

unnormalised: This Onam, instead of just feasting on delicious Payasam, why not feast on some knowledge too! (Okay, maybe have some Payasam *first*.)
normalised: This Onam, instead of just feasting on delicious Payasam, why not feast on some knowledge too! (Okay, maybe have some Payasam *first*.)

unnormalised: Apps like Vedantu and Byju's are household names now, and newer players are popping up all the time, offering competitive pricing and features. Expect to see even more innovation in this space, especially with AI playing a bigger role.
normalised: Apps like Vedantu and Byju's are household names now, and newer players are popping up all the time, offering competitive pricing and features. Expect to see even more innovation in this space, especially with A I playing a bigger role.

unnormalised: So, this Diwali, give yourself the gift of a little extra help. Download an exam prep app and give yourself that edge! Good luck folks!
normalised: So, this Diwali, give yourself the gift of a little extra help. Download an exam prep app and give yourself that edge! Good luck folks!
